definition: to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard

sentences.english: Do something other than check your email when you wake.
sentences.chinese: 醒来时随便做点什么，但不要去翻看你的电子邮件。

sentences.english: Check out the Tudor tatler for the inside scoop on all the news that was fit to print.
sentences.chinese: 翻看都铎新闻报纸，可以找到适于付版的内部消息。

sentences.english: Carol Ann Summer and her friend Bobbie Bold came looking for military records.
sentences.chinese: 卡罗尔奥恩夏季和她的朋友博比黑体来到军事翻看。
她飞快地翻看丈夫的日记。

sentences.english: I leafed through some science journals.
sentences.chinese: 我快速翻看一些科学的期刊。

sentences.english: I could feel that, mother had always leafed over those photos.
sentences.chinese: 我是能够感觉的，母亲生前经常翻看这些照片。

sentences.english: I leafed through some art books.
sentences.chinese: 我快速翻看一些艺术书籍。

sentences.english: Without thanking her, he flipped quickly to an article inside.
sentences.chinese: 他也没感谢她，快速地翻看里面的一篇文章。
她飞快地翻看丈夫的日记。

sentences.english: Today, I was sifting through my parents old home movies.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我在翻看我怙恃的旧的家庭录像。

sentences.english: Yes, but then I never look at my diary.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我会写，但我从不再翻看日记。

sentences.english: My wife always checks our wedding registry and gives the same as was given us.
sentences.chinese: 我妻子经常翻看婚礼注册账，然后等额回礼。

sentences.english: I leafed through the travel brochures.
Because, truthfully, who wants to sit at a computer and read hundreds of pages?
sentences.chinese: 因为实际上，谁会愿意坐在电脑前翻看几百页厚的书？

definition: to thumb through/to flip through (a book)
to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
to take down (in writing)/notes/a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches/CL:本[ben3]
to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross
book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
to record/record (written account)/note-taker/record (in sports etc)/CL:個|个[ge4]
